name: e2e-mobile-tests
description: End-to-end mobile automation tests for PearPass (Android & iOS, BrowserStack & local)

scripts.e2e:android:bs: cross-env PLATFORM=Android RUN_TARGET=bs ENABLE_QASE=true npm run wdio
scripts.e2e:ios:bs: cross-env PLATFORM=iOS RUN_TARGET=bs ENABLE_QASE=true npm run wdio
scripts.e2e:android:local: cross-env PLATFORM=Android RUN_TARGET=local_real_android ENABLE_QASE=false npm run wdio
scripts.e2e:ios:local: cross-env PLATFORM=iOS RUN_TARGET=local_real_ios ENABLE_QASE=false npm run wdio
scripts.e2e:android:emulator: cross-env PLATFORM=Android RUN_TARGET=local_emulator ENABLE_QASE=false npm run wdio
